full_threads.body: Re: Hi guys, the install finlandwpperk was migrated in today. It's a mu...

Help Salvador understand how they’re doing:

Rate your conversation

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 02:00 AM, "Salvador Aguilar" <salvador.aguilar@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Is there anything else I can help you with today ?

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:53 AM, "Salvador Aguilar" <salvador.aguilar@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

For what I can see on this site the following subsites are added:

+---------+-----------------------------+---------------------+---------------------+
| blog_id | url | last_updated | registered |
+---------+-----------------------------+---------------------+---------------------+
| 1 | http://finland.wpperk.com/ | 2018-03-01 14:29:26 | 2016-04-20 21:46:15 |
| 3 | https://kissgoodbyetoms.fi/ | 2018-07-16 12:06:12 | 2017-02-16 23:49:26 |
+---------+-----------------------------+---------------------+---------------------+

https://kissgoodbyetoms.fi/ works

It is working now:

curl -Ikl kissgoodbyetoms.fi
HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently
Date: Thu, 23 Aug 2018 15:55:53 GMT
Content-Type: text/html
Content-Length: 178
Connection: keep-alive
Set-Cookie: __cfduid=ddb0c5e90ca77c67f7e825bd8677bf6df1535039753; expires=Fri, 23-Aug-19 15:55:53 GMT; path=/; domain=.kissgoodbyetoms.fi; HttpOnly
Location: https://kissgoodbyetoms.fi/
X-Type: default
Server: cloudflare
CF-RAY: 44eec419328626a8-FRA

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:46 AM, "Salvador Aguilar" <salvador.aguilar@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

You will need to check your domain mapping plugin and settings.

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:45 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

But I need to load load the sub-site, before the migration it was on kissgoodbyetoms.fi

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:44 AM, "Salvador Aguilar" <salvador.aguilar@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Great :)

https://downloads.intercomcdn.com/i/o/73233918/1c7418d880e5e10fb507494f/image.png

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:44 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Oh yeah, now I do too.

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:43 AM, "Salvador Aguilar" <salvador.aguilar@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

I get sent to https://finland.wpperk.com/wp-signup.php?new=kissgoodbyetoms.fi

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:42 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

THanks for that, I have added the lines of code and it's now looking like a multisite in the backend. When I visit a sub-site, i'm getting the error message: https://kissgoodbyetoms.fi/ Error Establishing a Database connection

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:28 AM, "Salvador Aguilar" <salvador.aguilar@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

As per the official documentation: https://codex.wordpress.org/Create_A_Network

/* Multisite */
define( 'WP_ALLOW_MULTISITE', true );

Plus the lines that were produced which depend on how you actually set this multisite.

If you do not have the code, then I suggest you review the wp-config.php file from the previous host and copy those lines to the wp-config.php file on Kinsta.

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:26 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Do you have the multisite lines of code?

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:25 AM, "Salvador Aguilar" <salvador.aguilar@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Ok so you need to add the lines to wp-config.php and then add all the domains and subdomains to the domains tab of the site on My Kinsta for it to work.

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:23 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

I believe it was subdomain based, but each site has it's own unique domain

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:22 AM, "Salvador Aguilar" <salvador.aguilar@kinsta.intercom-mail.com> wrote:

Hi there,

Yes, the lines for multisite on wp-config.php are required for the multisite to actually work

Now, is this multisite domain based, folder based or subdomain based?

On Fri, Aug 24, 2018 at 01:20 AM, "WP Perk Support Team" <support@wpperk.com> wrote:

Hi guys, the install finlandwpperk was migrated in today. It's a mulitsite and now when I try to visit a sub-site, it's only loading the primary site... any ideas would be great. I can see that the mulitsite lines of code is missing in the wp-config file> not sure if this is the cause?
